This is heaven for meat lovers! They have great food especially the steaks and the roasted pinneapples! The service is phenomenal and the servers are cery nice and helpful. Special shoutout to our waiters Melfis and johnny.

Thank you Johnny :) everything was perfect tonight! My favorite items of their menu were the barbq ribs and grilled pine apple! The meat was so tender it came right off the bone. The pineapple was perfectly picked and grilled to perfection topped with a sprinkle of cinnamon. The L.I.Ts are nice and strong so ask for one of those! For dessert, ask for the flan. Unlike what I'm use to, the flan is sweet and light. Enjoy :)

All the food and service was spectacular. One of the servers, Johnny was very nice and helpful with everything since it was our first time there. Definitely going to let others know about this restaurant.

Some of the meat has the same flavor profile basically vinegar type of marinade, beef kabob was very tough to chew even when it was cut up into bite size...some parts such as pork loin with cheese was waaaay to sour because of vinegar...the salad bar was meh looked cheap...pasta bolognese had no grated cheese as a condiment, I asked one of the cooks for it and he told me no they don't have it.  We're talking Saturday night.  The servers were nice and willing to help that's nice, the place looked clean and ample seating available for large parties.

I absolutely love this place! The ambiance here is always amazing and the service is out of this world. Karla was our waitress and she always made sure we were tended to. One of the servers Johnny (hope I spelled that right lol!) was always serving us with a smile and giggles. He told us the best meats and what to savor. We have been here a million times but my oh my the service never changes and the people here are always bright. Thank you for making my mom's birthday amazing! Gracias!!!!!

This is my first time here , came for dinner and it's a very nice restaurant, great atmosphere, and exceptionally great service would definitely recommend this restaurant if you are looking for good food and it has valet parking so no need trying to find parking. Oh and Johnny that's serving the meats well done SIR with you're hospitality and paying keen attention to not letting the plates get empty, keep up the good work.

Came to Rainhas as a last minute resort and I must say it was a great experience. The food was good, the meats that they brought out was absolutely  superb. Two of the employees,  Johnny and Oscar was amazing. They made sure me and my guest was satisfied  at all times. They also kept bringing more meat even when our No thank you card was upright. This was my first time at Rainhas and must say I would definitely  come back. Thank you for a great meal and service.

This place is absolutely amazing. The hostess are very attentive as well as the servers. There are many different options at the buffet perfect place to take the family. Our server was named Johnny, he was kind and quick with our request. P.S. I highly recommend trying the Hennessy Mojito.
Food was great !!!! Lemon chicken was good you have to try it !!! Johnny the waiter was very attentive always made sure we was happy n satisfied with the service....I recommend this place ...

Watch out the meal is a very good price it's the extras that get ur wallet !  Very friendly the servers are hit and miss with the meats the chocolate cake was ok the velvet cake was better try finding your own parking outside we did not have a reservation but were seated within 15 minutes on a Sunday at 8 pm informed that Samba dancing is only on Saturday OEY. Try getting a table in the main dinner my area by the salad bar much more lively.   Had a very good time more Spanish style then Brazilian Yes !

Stay away. 2hr time limit and 3hrs in, I was waiting on EVERYTHING. Had to flag a waiter/waitress every time I need anything. No attention to the customer (this is a Rodizio Steakhouse). Topping it off they would not accept any credit card without a chip. My doesn't so had to slug to an ATM pay over $5 in fees to get cash to pay for the dinner. Not coming back.

Just came to Rainhas for the first time today. We were seated right away. They have a buffet of assorted foods. We really enjoyed the salad bar but the rice and beans were very well seasoned. SO MUCH MEAT comes around. They definitely enjoy getting their customers very full. Johnny took very good care of us. He made sure we tried every type of meat they offer including their new item the garlic chicken. The garlic chicken was definitely my favorite! The have a cart of desserts that they wheel around to everyone and we had the the cheesecake. Everything was so good and the service was great which is definitely hard to come by! We will be coming back and we hope to see Johnny again!
The food was okay, Loved the pasta but the waiters weren't attentive. And the steak was too raw.

Brazilian all i can eat!  This place used to be Greenfield. It used to be so much better. Food was not up to stardard.   Was a bit disappointed on the buffet selections. They don't have oxtail!   We do not  want fries and chicken fingers.  The buffet was a bit mediocre. The bbq meat were not flavorful either. Everything started tasting the same. Their selection of steak were limited as we only see the same meat coming out. For the  price we want flavorful tasty quality food. We didn't get that.  We needed to dip on sauces to get the flavor. Service?  Eh. Not much. We very much took care of  ourselves. We do not plan to go back.  Its overrated. For that money I can eat better food.

Great venue for food, however on my last visit.. while hanging out with a friend we wanted to have drinks and an appetizer and the service at the bar was horrible, it was cash only & we weren't allowed to order apps while we were at the bar.. this was so disappointing... and it's truly sad.. hope this rules changes soon.

I've been coming to this restaurant since 2000s when it was still called Greenfield. I've always enjoyed the food. The meats are well seasoned and made just right! Service is great. Johnny (one of the servers) is very friendly and he'll make sure you'll enjoy your meal. It's one of the best churrascarias in town!
Good food but even better service! Shout out to Johnny, one of our servers, for always checking in to see if we wanted any specific cuts. Great experience.

Let me start of with the Rainhas Signature Pineapple Caipirinha drink. It was good, I had a few in my days and it perfecto for them having the muddled pineapple and lime. Caipirinha is a Brazilian rum. The food was delicious, from the steak, roast beef, pork with the melted mozzarella cheese, cooked to steak perfection in terms of being juicy and savory. We had a waiter was good, gave us a lot of meat to taste and try, however, he became a bit overwhelming due to his eagerness to make us meat even when we turned  the place card to say we want no more meat, he continued to come. It was like do you not see the card. Had to politely tell him we were full. Thats not to say we didn't like the attention, there needs to be a balance especially in a resturant setup like that. Giving me more doesn't increase the tip I am going to give you.  Needless to say, it's a family oriented resturant.  The kids will enjoy. It's big enough to host large parties. There's valet parking which is a plus in busy and congested Northern Blvd.

My experience here was nothing short of AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!! Boy oh boy was I unprepared for what the night held for me and our dinner party. The decor is very nice. It was love at first sight when my eyes saw the waterfall wall........oh my goodness I absolutely love to be around water although I don't know how to swim lol....it soothes my soul. We had a party of 28 people for our friend's surprise birthday dinner party. We had to wait in the front of the restaurant before we were seated because some of us were there early. I explained to the greeter why we needed to be seated before the guest of honor arrived and within twenty minutes we were seated when at least half of the guests had arrived which was definitely cool. When the birthday girl arrived, it was time for us to get our eat on. Now I still didn't understand the dynamics of the restaurant. The salad bar is AWESOME! There were different meats, entrees and sides surrounding the salad bar. I'm thinking to myself after loading my plate, that the meat selection wasn't all that. Oh how I was proved wrong within minutes after I started eating my food. A wonderful gentleman comes to my table with piping hot steak fresh off the grill on skewers, ready to give us sliced meat right at the table. Oh my goodness the amount of meat that was brought to the table made me feel like what did I do to be able to partake in this wonderful experience. Filet mignon wrapped with bacon, boneless chicken wrapped with bacon, sausages, fresh sweet corn, chicken wings, all kinds of beef fresh off the grill........AWESOME! All of the meat served was absolutely seasoned and cooked to perfection. When they brought grilled pineapple sprinkled with cinnamon to the table, we all fell in love all over again with Rainhas. All of the servers were awesome and very attentive to our needs. I will definitely be back soon.

Great service, amazing food! From the grilled corn on the cob, the grilled pineapple to the skirt steak... I love this place!Johnny is an amazing GAUCHER aka the meat runner! I've always loved coming here but with all the new menu additions.. it's even more of a reason to come back soon!
Most of the meat are over cooked and taste dry. The meat feels like they have been cooked twice and super hard to chew

Okay so how can I comment here without sounding like a total touché, it's my dads birthday when we visited here on the weekend and nothing got done as planned the only reason I came back here because when it was my mothers bday on July 21 we had a manager to take care of her surprise and gave us the utmost greatest customer service his name is Roberto and George for helping us get seats by the water display since we also wanted Johnny to serve us in that section.This weekend there wasn't salad out like I don't know what happen but do you guys wait until the salad runs out? And when I asked the manager that day he said and I kid you not "awesome sauce" like did he understand what I was trying to tell him about refilling it since my girlfriend is a vegan, not the kind of response I was waiting. At least take ownership of a mistake that's why you are a "manager" I personally asked for Roberto when I made my reservations they told me he no longer works there, thank god George was there again to help me out. The meat was 10/10, like always Johnny is the best and always listens to us, that keen attention in how we want our meat is legit because not all servers are like that. Thank you for the wonderful food, ask for the pineapple I recommend it, but please have someone out there who knows how to speak to your customers in a professional matter.

LOVE LOVE LOVE! I went for a birthday and EVERYTHING was PERFECT!! If you're a meat lover this is the place for you... everything was sooooo delicious, from drinks to food. They came around with all sorts of meats giving generous slices, the sides and appetizers were buffet style and the desserts were on the cart.
Great service with a lot of options in the buffet. Jonny was our waiter and he was great constantly checking up if we needed anything. Great place highly recommend

I came here for my birthday and I had a great experience. They had complementary valet parking & the place was very nice. To enjoy the full experience you have to be STARVING!!!!!!! They have so much food! The meat was so tender and good. The sides were so good. The only complaints about the place was it was cold for some reason & also did not like how dessert was not included in the buffet. However, the food was plentiful and very satisfying. The waitress Yennifer was nice & the bathroom downstairs was clean. I appreciate a restaurant with clean bathrooms. I would recommend for people for special occasions not everyday dining. It is quite pricey but worth it for a special night out! I enjoyed my experience at Rainhas!

Came here for my brothers birthday, it's been a while and every time there's just amazing service. Our server was attentive and knowledgeable, able to answer any questions we had. The buffet offered a variety of food but I can tell you right now when I come to this place I don't come for the buffet I come for the mea! Tenderloin, skirt steak, pork bbq ribs, chicken, etc all amazing! The gentlemen offering us the meat were very kind with a good sense of humor making our experience even better. Piña colada was so good but i had so much food i couldn't finish it, their signature pineapple dessert I would highly recommend! In terms of pricing, lunchtime is a little less expensive than if you come for dinner. I'll definitely be back!

Slowest service ever. My party of 5 arrived for a bachelor party dinner. We were promptly seated (the only reason they got a star) but the meat runners seemed to have an aversion to our section (our cards were all flipped to green btw). After an initial selection of burnt sausage and bacon wrapped chicken jerky, we noticed 3 different types of meats going right past us to the other 2 sections of the restaurant (we were seated right by the meat prep station) while our plates remained empty. They essentially fill you up with cheap selections then run out the 2 hour time limit. Worth it? No.

New manager Odilon service was awesome I have been coming to this place for a long time and this is the first time  a manager come over to us and ask us if everything was good I was very pleased with this new manager, which everyone was like him.

To whom it may concern:First of all I want to Thank You for the great night that we had last night (12.14.18) at Rainhas! Once more you guys went above and beyond to treat my Annual Office Dinner like if it was your own. This is the second year we have it at Rainhas and I have to say it didn't disappoint.I want to point out 3 of your employees, Ms. Celeste she went beyond her duties to make sure EVERYONE was taken care of, Mr. Jonathan never stopped, he went from cleaning the tables all the way to help me discard of a box, he went all over and always willing to assist and the girl that was doing the desserts almost to the end of the night (her name escapes my mind, I apologize) She was so so accommodating. I will not leave out all the (rodizios) men they were funny and helpful. I don't have a single complaint from your place and have to point out that it was even more busy than last year around the same time and yet you guys met each and every need of my party, I thank you for that!Again, Thank you for an exceptional night! you guys ROCK! And it is the 2nd time my bosses say that they will come back next year. We had been doing our annual dinner each year in a different place but they are "hooked" with Rainhas! so Thank You, THANK YOU!!  Until 2019! I wish all of you from management to maintenance the best for the new year, keep the good work and the great employees!Liz R.

Wooooow!!!!!!!!!!!!! This place is the best Brazilian restaurant ever. My stomach is so happy. A wide variety of meat. Oh and ask for that chimichurri sauce. Girrrrlllllllllll. A must come. Servers - excellent Food- excellent Salad bar- excellentDecor-excellent Ambiance- excellent These servers and workers need to be getting paid top dollar. We love you Johnny the meat server. He truly made my dining experience here wonderful. Give that man a raise lol or bonus or something.  And Jon the waiter who took care of us needs that money too. Excellent service.

Decent brazilian steakhouse for the price and since it is all you can eat but I have had better. Food wise i would give it 3 stars due to the smaller than normal variety of their salad bar (incomparison to other brazilian steakhouses) and some of the food was pretty salty although again, most places like this oversalt their meats. Loveddd the corn but i would scrape off a ton of salt. My family members loved the cinnamon glazed pineapple and the chicken hearts i believe? Brisket and wings were nothing special but the ribs, top sirloin, spicy sausage and steak/chicken wrapped in bacon were delicious. Did not really like their cheesy bread it tasted like straight up cheese to me i've had much better. Celebrated my birthday here so i got a slice of tiramisu with a sparkler which was super cute :)Bumped up the star rating for Johnny he was an amazing server! If we asked or mentioned something (or if we even overheard us) we wanted more of he made it a point to come back to our table of 13. Appreciated that for sure!
It's rare in any of the NYC boroughs to find great food, hospitable ambience, and superb service for an affordable price; specially for a large group like ours (13). Keep up the value!

Every type of meat we tried was utter gatbage. The taste was rancid. The meat was chewy. The buffet is very basic. Desserts are extra (unless you wanna stuff your face with jello). Soda drinks are NOT included. 174 USD plus gratuity for 3 persons and no dessert. For this amount of money you can eat in the best Churrascaria in Manhattan. Their best item was probably the grilled pineapple. This place is horrendous. I feel so angry to have wasted my money on this. Learn from other people's mistakes. Don't go there.

This was an over hyped all you could eat .....best to save your money and go buy a plate you can enjoy someplace else that comes with some elbow room that you can get a good quality meat and not the cheapest coverup job on a sticking town!  If there was a food police they would fine this place for lack of flavor...... that's hard to do when you're supposedly cooking to meat over the top of an open flame but they managed to do it.

So much food! Get the Rodizio for the full experience, rotation of meats, hot buffet and salad bar 37.95. It is worth the money. The polite servers come around with different meats until you've had enough. Definitely try the roasted pineapple. Will definitely come back again.

Food is amazing, service is phenomenal, the staff is awesome; Johnny in particular went out of his way to be very accommodating. Kid friendly establishment, offers something for everyone, truly everyone. Huge restaurant that helps accommodate the volume of patrons this business draws in.Valet parking does get backed up a little, but that's NYC for you. (Valet was bad because of a private event being held)

Definitely come here for the experience of a Brazilian buffet! The meat is fairly juicy but would be better if it is was a bit more tender. The pork ribs is the most tender and tastes really good- would highly recommend! The caramelized pineapple is really unique and quite crispy on the outside. The service here is very good and you will definitely feel cared for. Different types of meat comes around every 5 minutes or so. I would probably come once every year just for the experience itself!
Love the pineapple Love the staff The strawberry mojito has me feeling a certain way
Johnny was an amazing server. Very attentive & friendly. He helps us with whatever we needed & I will definitely be back!
Wonderful place,it was my first time here was very impressed and the food was amazing....

A meat lovers dream! They have a large variety of cuts and can request to have your meats at whatever temperature you desire. They also have a nice selection of sides at the buffet which are very different than other Churrascarias (ig. they have seafood sides and other types of meats). The drinks are also delicious. Must try the pineapple, one of their signatures :)

Terrible experience!My waiter came on my table only 2 times.I had to wait to order another drink for 30 minutes.My first hour at this place they only offer to me Sausage,wings and sirloin...Have to ask for the meat runners 7x to replace the white rice at the buffet. Salad bar and hot buffet is horrible! Meats has no flavor at all and service is ridiculous.They must change the name because this is longer to be a Brazilian Churrascaria.

Me and my girlfriend went here and it was great. Most of the meats were very good and perfectly cooked. The pineapple is and corn are a all time favorite. Our server, Johnny took very good care of us making sure we didn't miss out on anything.

Amazing service and amazing food. Have been coming here since the old owners and they remain to keep their quality up. Their drinks are great and our waiter had recommended some great drinks and loved them. Would recommend to anyone who wants to eat a lot and fill up.
Johnnie and all staff were great! Thanks for the grilled pineapples with cinnamon or similar flavoring. Great meats and buffet! A feast! -Sid

This place is a good example of "you get what you pay for". We tried this place because we love Churrascaria and it's a little less expensive than the places in the city. We went on a week night, which I understand isn't always the best time to experience a new place, but we walked out just feeling sad and disappointed. The salad bar is BASIC. Sad mostly empty bowls of wilted salad toppings. No plantains or any of the other accompaniments you expect. They had some other main dishes (chicken Marsala, spaghetti bolognese) that honestly looked inedible and untouched. The worst part was that there was NO CHEESE BREAD. I found out at the end of the meal that you could request it, but it would take 10 minutes or so. As far as the meats go, the quality was fine but the selection was disappointing, and the rotation was sparse. Also everything was clearly seasoned with A1 steak sauce which is fine on steak, but really bizarre on pork loin...To put it simply, there's nothing worth returning for.

I'm sorry but where was Roberto when I had an issue with my drinks on Sunday? I was thinking of becoming a regular here with my husband and kids, I didn't feel the same energy with the staff unless he is around. The food was great, I love coming here since it's a super close to me, my husband likes to come here because all he talks about with Roberto are the sports you know guy things so I can't come here anymore. The drinks were horrible and didn't even get an apology since I ordered a piña colada without alcohol.

I always come here for some special occasion. I did not come for 6 months ...it's have so much different, they didn't bring food for u right a way for u. Before they come so fast ..but now is so slow , so many stuff didn't provide now ... disappointed

I came here on a weeknight and was overall disappointed in both the service and the food.Food - the selection of meat was limited. The 2 steak meats were overdone (although "medium"), tough and lacked flavor. The only 2 meat dishes that I liked were the bacon wrapped meat (filet mignon I believe) and the cheese covered pork but here the topping on top added the needed flavor to the meat. The buffet was also not impressive.Service - our waitress was attentive and nice. My biggest annoyance was that the restaurant stopped coming around with steaks/meat over 45 min before closing. In my mind, that was much too early especially when there were plenty of tables still occupied.

The service was excellent! Everyone was attentive to assure I was satisfied with my service. Our gaucho for the night was Johnny and he is the perfect guy to attend you if you plan on enjoying your time at Rainhas.
If I could give this place 0 stars I would! Only got 4 pieces of meat, been in there for 45 mins! I will never come back. They were very racist!

Great restaurant with awesome waiters in particular Johnny, our favorite!! He's attentive and personable. The food is delicious and fresh! He always looks out for us and makes us laugh with his great stories. There are many desserts to choose from and a great place to celebrate special occasions.

Had a great time with the fam last night!! Johnny was awesome, accommodating our needs with the picanhas!! We felt like kings & queens. I will definitely be returning here often. Our family is from Sao Paulo so if it's good in our standards, it's good for everyone else!!

I have to say , I've been to a few buffet style restaurants but thus far this has been the best one I've come across. Excellent food and service. The ambiance is very relaxing and it is also kid friendly. The restaurant has a very upscale look to it which I definitely appreciate. Please come here if you want to experience the best Brazilian food and if you love being catered too. #1 place on my list right now :)
Great food, great service, great bar, the waiters are very kind and good, and the waiter Jonny is the best, every time I go there he hooks us up. A Deserved 5 stars
My colleague recommended this restaurant to me. This is also my first visit and trying Brazilian food. Excellent service and staffs are very friendly

We came here for my father in laws birthday dinner and it was amazing! The food was incredible, the service was amazing and the drinks were spot on. One of our waiter's name is Johnny and he always came around making sure we got to try every single meat. I especialy loved the chicken rolled in bacon that was marinated in wine and a bit of mayonnaise. When we arrived, they accommodated us very quickly and its a very lovely amibiance. The mango sorbet was very delicious as everything else. We didn't bring a birthday cake,not knowing that they offered the singing at the table. They sang Happy Birthday in tune and made my father in law feel very special. It was my first time coming here rather than my fiancée's and his family. I know that our family will definitely be coming back. Exceptional!

My first time here and my experience was awesome. The food and services were outstanding. Raymond was a server who was excellent he even showed how they make the roasted pineapple which was amazing. I totally recommend.
Love this place! You will definitely leave with a belly full! So many exotic dishes to try!

I normally love this place, I really do. Unfortunately this will be the last time I ever come to this place again. I was with a group of three. They sat us in a closet! It was so small and cramped. I was seated right next to a table with small noisy children. They were running around the tables and yelling. The parent would just sit there and then have sudden outburst of yelling and hitting. The meat that normally comes to all the tables did not come to us because as I repeat we WERE IN A CLOSET! Being put in a box felt as if I was being punished for coming to this place. I understand if space was limited or if they were only taking big parties but they weren't. I saw tables of two, three and four sitting in the main area. This was suppose to be a wonderful mother's day dinner but instead it was a horrible one.

I was looking for a place to eat some good steak and i yelped steak and this Jewel came up. So we came here not knowing what to expect, we were greeted by this young man and were immediately sat down. once we settled a very nice lady named Nancy came by and asked us if we were ever here we said no, She kindly explained to us exactly how this worked!.. the buffet had a pretty great selection honestly i love me some mac and cheese and i had to go back 3 times! 3 times! ( i guess i was hungry) all the food was hot (sometimes buffet style might get a little cold) lol overall i had a great experience. The meat selection was awesome!!.. ribs, steak, chicken, beef, you name it my fav was the pork loin with lemon pepper covered in mozzarella it was  so delicious!! The staff were very friendly and accommodating for us, i was so impressed i most likely will be reserving a table for my upcoming birthday next month!!! :) def a must go to this restaurant!..

All I can say is awesome.... The food, the service, the entire staff.....  we will come back again soon and bring friends...... Thank you to Johnny...and Eduardo ...  The duck was amazing .  When they asked if there was anything else we wanted.... I asked for duck ...they responded with it will be right out, and it was...straight to our table and yummy.    Luv this place. Great food  , great drinks!

3 stars because it wasn't worth the $36. But 5 stars for service and the amazing pineapples. Not sure if it was because it was a Sunday but they didn't have that many options and the guys weren't going around as much. I'm not sure if I'll go back to spend the money when I can go out and have a nice steak dinner for the same amount. But this was definitely a different experience and I don't regret going.

Great restuarant...food was amazing..all different types of   delicious meats served..but the Rainhas caramelized pineapple won me over..The staff was extremely attentive...waiter Jonathan was excellent and friendly, server Johnny was exceptional..

Rainhas never disappoints! I have been here a few times and the food is always amazing. The variety of meats and choices on the salad bar are next to none. Rainhas also has terrific service! One of our servers, Johnny, made sure we had a chance to try all of the meats that were being served and took really great care of us. We will definitely be returning!
Nice atmosphere, good service, good food, bad steak sauce, delicious coconut sorbet, okay lemonade.
This place is mediocre at best. This place is about as Brazilian as Olive Garden is Italian. It's an upscale American buffet with linen tablecloths that happens to offer some ok Brazilian meats.

I haven't been here in years, and I don't remember why the family and I stopped coming but this Sunday we came to celebrate my mother's birthday. The Renovations that we're done were awesome, and the food was still just as good as I remember. Buffet style restaurant then waiters walk around with a large selection of meats for you to choose from. And don't forget the pineapple OMG !!!! The best ever. I just wish they had more room so that all the food could be out instead of waiting for one heated area is empty to put a different type of  tray of food.Our waiter was never far, and we were a party of 12, the environment was great for families with kids and large groups in general.

Giving a rating of two stars is generous but I feel bad giving less. The quality of the meat is subpar. The picture below is the bacon wrapped "fillet" but it's more like bacon wrapped fat and gristle. Each piece of meat I cut into was extremely tough. The only flavor of the meat came from the chimichurri sauce, which was delicious. Labeling the items at the salad bar is crucial because nobody knows what is what up there. The restaurant really wasn't that busy but yet it took at least 4 times to ask for a Coke. I'm leaving a buffet hungry. I wouldn't return to this place unless the quality of the meat goes up.

This place is the best!! Great and fast service!! The variety of meets was terrific!! Johnny was the best he supplied me with endless pineapple to make sure I was digesting all the meat ok!! 100% worth it!!!!
The food was excellent and the service was great! Johnny was our favorite! Gave great recommendations.
I highly recommend it. Staff service was great and especially Johnny was amazing. The food is also amazing
This place never gets old! I really enjoy eating here and I love the roasted pineapple! ask for Johnny to serve you! He is awesome!

This place deserves five stars but I'm giving it four because I came on Easter Sunday and it was hectic.  The upstairs bathroom was dirty. However the buffet food was good and the meat was delicious. The desserts were served separately because that's priced individually. I recommend coming during non holiday hours.
The steaks were on point, juicy and not burned dry. The employees were super nice. Well worth the money compared to other places

Terrible experience! They made us wait 10 minutes for valet after waiting, the hostess didn't arrive for another 5 minutes. After one hostess was waiting to accommodate us, the hostess was rude and unprofessional and told us they were closing. After waiting to get the car back, they brought back the wrong car. Very unpleasant experience!

Came here for my bro's birthday lunch, Stick with beef product and their grill pineapple/corn etc, the grill pork products has a strange aroma and taste to it, staff are friendly and attentive to ones need

We went to celebrate my daughter birthday. The place was clean and the salad bar had a pretty good selection of side dishes. The guys that came around with the meat were friendly and chatty. Which was a nice touch to our evening. However our waiter was a bit inattentive. He seemed to always be in a rush. And maybe he was after all it was Saturday night. I don't blame him. I blame the establishment. They should consider hiring more waiters for the weekend service. For the amount of money they are changing for plate they should provide more attentive service. Also my husband was sitting next to the wall water feature  and he kept getting wet. They should consider moving the tables away from it.

We were in Queens so we decided to try this place since the yelp reviews were favorable... but we were very disappointed. Pros: place is clean, buffet selection and salad bar are very good. Service was good also. Cons: black beans are only served with bacon, no regular beans available. Picanha was just ok, the other cuts so so, chicken hearts horrible. Didn't get to try the skirt steak despite being there for over an hour. Will not go back.
Food was great ,service was great had a great time for my moms birthday oh and the caprinhas were on point

This place used to be called, "Green Field" since the last time I came here.  The style is still good, with this green and red signal for waiters to either keep serving the hunks of meat or stop.  The food is alright, a bit heavier than I remember.  Maybe I am getting old or something, because back in college my friends and I would keep that wooden block on green until we needed to leave for a movie or something.  Overall this is nice.
Excellent service From Jhonny and Patricio.The food was amazing and make sure you save room for dessert
This is on my list of top 5 steakhouses i absolutely love this place and look forward to taking my gf here always recommended amazing meat and dessert
Johnny the waiter excellent in giving good service. I have to write about him because he keep passing a lot to the table with different meats. The food excellent. I will definitely be back.
Unlimited supply of bbq and wonderful buffet. The service is impeccable and onsite valet parking. This place has it all. Grilled pineapple is fabulous
One of the best buffets I've been to in a while. Servers are well mannered and the food is delicious. Definitely coming back soon!

There is not much to say rather then to GO HERE AND TRY IT ! But if you were looking for a longer review i can go into detail. Ironic enough, the best thing about this place is the pineapple that is served table side. It is cooked with a sort of cinnamon coating and just gushes with flavor in your mouth. All of the meat(s) are cooked to perfection and seasoned perfectly, and the service is very quick. Also, the sides, which weren't very necessary due to the quality of meat, were very well seasoned, cooked, and prepared. If i could give this place 6 stars out of 5 i would. Hands down.

We have to pass through this place on the reg every month or so; the spot has quality food and great service. Johnny is THE man with excellent attention to detail and he is very personable.The last time I came here, Omar was super cool to my son. He hasn't stopped talking about this churrascaria since then! BRAVO Rainhas, we'll see you soon...

The restaurant was amazing.  We were seated right away, no reservations and the service was Immaculate.  I wanted to especially recognize Johnny one of the servers whom took care of us as if we were guests in his home.  He was very attentive to our needs wether we wanted a specialty meat or dessert.  I would highly recommend this restaurant for any occasion, if you ask me this is a gem in Queens with the touch of the City life style.   I'm so thrilled my family and I discovered this place!!! To top it off an hour into dinner (perfect for digestion) there was a performance with a Brazilian samba dance.

This steakhouse is amazing, but not only because if the food, the service is incredible. The meats just keep coming and the pineapple is to die for! Johnny is a great waiter, very quick and helpful. He always has a smile on his face and is dedicated to making our dinner here exceptional EVERY SINGLE TIME! Overall the food is great, don't fill up on the salad bar and hot food because the variety of meats will have you well beyond full what you walk (or roll) out.
food is great, our server Jonny is amazing. Very attentive and helpful. Prices are good, will definitely be coming back.
We came to celebrate my step-dad birthday and our waiter Karla was amazing super attentive, sweet, friendly and very patient considering we had our 3 kids. Thank you so much Karla!
Not worth the money. Pay the extra $20 and go to fogo de chao in the city. Food does not taste fresh.

I did not try the original establishment, but the new place is a stand up place. It's a beautiful establishment   with exotic decor and a fantastic waterfall glass wall. The noise level is respectfully low with a highly attentive staff.The menu price is a little extravagant. We had an early service for dinner. The salad bar was not very impressive. I wasn't a fan of the dried up Mac and Cheese and dried up tilapia. The salad and side dishes were basic and simple. Jello was the highlight. However, who goes there for salad, right? The long awaited came out quickly and often: lamb, sirloin, brisket, pork belly, the works. Shish kabobs did not disappoint. All meats came out in  large portion. They gave you a card: green for Yes and orange for no.I have no complaints for meats. It was done in a  phenomenal fashion. Ribs were good. Beef ribs were amazing. You cannot leave this establishment without trying the grilled pineapples. They are out of this world and they melt in your mouth.The one warning that I have is that they get you on drinks. They didn't tell me that drinks were not refillable. $2.50 a piece. Alcoholic drinks were priced obviously the high end: $13 each. If you want dessert, it's $8.95 which did not bother me because I was too full anyway.

We LOVE this place. The staff is super attentive and it's pretty easy to get a table at 6pm for two on a Saturday. The FREE valet parking is definitely a plus since the parking in Corona isn't always great. The wait staff comes around constantly to refill your drinks, bring by meat, or clear your buffet plate so you can go get another round. The food at the buffet is delicious as well. And they make awesome cocktails. Between the amazing price (35 per person), the awesome selection of food, the great wait staff and the drinks, you really cannot go wrong.

Came here for the first time to celebrate my hubby's birthday on Thursday. The service and environment is great, but for the price and food choice are terrible 1. The light of half of the restaurant is off. It looks very empty.2. The buffet bar section is really low quality. Three different types of salad and some picked vegetables. There are also some different kinds of rice....3. There are totally around six kind of meat rotation. No Lamb from Monday to Thursday. After talking with the waitress, she told us there are much more meat choices from Friday to Sunday.The price is always the same. I don't understand why they offer different menu without mentioning on website.
Johnny was an amazing server!! He brought us the freshest and best meat! Loved it here!

Everything was great tonight. Although it was quite busy for a Wednesday night the service was impeccable. The food was amazing and the staff was so attentive. Especially Johnny was so efficient!!! Great great work! Thank You!

This place is so good !! Everything from the food to the servers and host are amazing I've been here 6 times and I've never been disappointed my fav waiter and server is melfis & Johnny !!  They deff tAke well care of you !!!!

Amazing amazing place amazing staff obviously the best food fresh juicy Steaks. So far my best place number 1 spot to be at with family. The best service by my man JHONNY did let me put the fork down. Even tho they were busy he made sure I was eating fresh.  I Recomended everyone should visit eat and enjoy.  Thanks for fresh and amazing service

This is always my favorite and most recommended steak house/buffet. Two years later and Johnny was serving us again and remembered us! He's always so friendly and keeps up with us and whatever we want to come around to the table he makes sure to bring to us. He makes the experience there overall amazing!! Definitely fulfills the needs of his customers and pays close attention to them.

Oddly enough, you want to come here when the place is packed.Why? Because then all the employees are running around with skewers of the different kinds of meat. The first time I went, the meat was just coming and going, I could wait a few minutes for the ones I wanted.The second time I went, the restaurant was filled about half way, so there would just be one or two guys bringing out skewers. This service was much slower and I didn't enjoy the experience then.The dessert prices are jacked up like crazy, but they taste good. Whether or not you want to drop $9 for that, it's up to you.The pineapple is the best thing here.
Wonderful service! I like  the variety of meat that was served. The grilled pineapple was definitely a favorite. I will be back to enjoy this wonderful restaurant once again. 5 stars for sure!
Very clean!!! Excellent customer service. Very delicious !!! Yo will I've this place!! Guarantee!! Must visit!!

I came here with my family for my sisters birthday and I have to say this place is amazing. From the meat to the sides I loved every bit of it. I recommend the shrimp, Mac and cheese, mashed potatoes, and broccoli. The meats were really out of this world I loved th steak and ribs. I usually don't like sausage but the salchichas were amazing. If you get the chance to eat here you won't regret it!

This place has good food.  This is our third time here.  The service we had from Juan and Johnny was great!  Johnny was amazing!!!  He was very accommodating and brought us exactly what we wanted.  He already knew what we would like based on what we asked for. He provided the best service we have ever had here.  Not sure if you can request him but it's worth a try!

This place is awesome. It's well worth the price. The buffet is huge and extremely tasty. But don't get full off of that because the meat is none stop. They come around with over 30 different types of meats and the pineapple was Delicius. They didn't rush you out like most places which was good and they have valet parking. The best part other then the food and attentive service was the special drinks. It's a must that you get one. I can still taste it. We will be back for more very soon!
The service was amazing!Had a district dinner there, the team had a great time. Patricio and Johnny were great!Good food.

Ask for Jhonny the meat connoisseur, friendly and courteous, The Best Waiter on the place. Nice clean, great food, highly recommended place in Queens. Easy access from major highways and Valet Parking.

Love this place! I literally ate my body weight in assorted meats and that's never a bad thing.The atmosphere has a relaxed elegance that anyone from the young to the elderly can enjoy. The staff was very friendly and made sure our plates were never empty and our stomachs full. The wine was also very good ( recommend the Malbec) My only issue was the buffet station. To me it was sort of lacking and I don't think they came out to replace any of the food the whole time I was there. Granted it was a Monday night and pouring raining so not many customers so they get a pass cause everything else was so great. I definitely recommend this place to anyone celebrating a birthday or just wants a nice evening out with an all you can eat experience. Tip - make sure you bring your fat pants and enjoy!

Nice atmosphere. Beautiful. Price wasn't terrible considering it's all you can eat. The meat didn't come around quick enough for me, the food wasn't the tastiest, and the variety at the hot buffet section wasn't the greatest. I have had better. I liked the concept of the restaurant. Not mad I went but probably will not be back
Amazing experience at Rainhas for my husbands 41st birthday the food was amazing and the customer service was superb we will definitely be back !!
Really good food and service. Our server Johnny was really attentive. Capiriniahs a little too sweet for my taste but food made up for it and then some . Definitely recommend, can't miss
I had a great experience eating here the food was delicious and the waiters were excellent  serving the meats especially Jonathan I well recommend this place to everybody

What a wonderful experience! Have not been to a churrascaria in long long time  and while on a trip to NYC decided my wife needed to know exactly what I've been talking about all these years... Rainhas did not disappoint, great service, excellent meat, exactly what this type of restaurant is all about.

This was my first time visiting. There was a great selection of meats served at the table. Also a decent selection at the buffet. My only complaint is that they did not give additional silverware as we were transitioning plates. And I know they make money off of drinks, but $5 for a tea with no honey available seems a bit much. But I would definitely revisit. It also had a nice atmosphere with music and the waterfall wall

The rodizio experience is fun. Besides that, nothing to write home about. Drinks were mediocre, service slow, and a good amount of the meats were overcooked. To top it off, half our ice cream cake melted and we were still given a $9 service charge for bringing our own cake.
My favorite restaurant Melfis and Johnny are the perfection combination. Ask for them!

Great service amazing food and the guys who were bringing the meat to the table were super friendly... I recommend this place to anybody, everyone will love this place. Jonny and Jose Juan kept on bringing different meat and even asked which meat did we specifically want  , they both gave us great service and made us feel very welcome.

This is my first time trying a Brazilian buffet, and it is something out of my league. However, it isn't my first time trying Brazilian food. Having tried Brazilian cuisine in Las Vegas, I decided to remind myself what it tasted like. I made reservations over the phone two days ahead of arrival. They called me a day before arrival and confirmed. We were seated promptly upon arrival. I forgot to mention, there is valet parking available in their parking lot. You have a choice of getting the meat with the buffet which costs about $35pp, and without the meat which is their general buffet which is around $22pp. I got the buffet because my friends got the meat buffet. What I mean by the meat buffet is that waiters come around with a rack of meat (lamb, ribeye, pineapple, more steak, chicken, beef..and so forth) and you can decide whether or not you want the meat. I was satisfied because I went for rounds of Cesar salad! I know, I came here for salad. But it was great. But not only that, there was oxtail and it was soft and meat fell right off with a bite, beef stew, cold sides, sushi (wouldn't suggest it), soups, typical fried foods, etc.Overall, service was good. Had to get a cake for the birthday boy, but there are no complimentary ones! Large restaurant and wasn't even packed on a Friday night.

Awesome restaurant. And the food was great. Buffet includes chicken marsala, shrimp, soups, and salads. The kale salad was my favorite. Endless supply of meats. Sirloin, tenderloin, and the filet wrapped in bacon. Everything was fantastic. Johnny was our server and he was amazing. He knew the ingredients to all the dishes and kept my entire party happy. Staff was excellent.

Went there today with family. 7 adults and 1 baby. They charged gratuity for 8 or more people even though baby didn't get any service. Then tried to upcharge all 7 for rodizio, even though only 4 had it. Waiters never even asked initially how many people were doing rodizio.. stating that waiters saw people sharing meat. We didn't. The waiter accidentally put that in one of the plates and it was removed. Also charged for a drink we didn't have. Took supervisor and manager to fix the bill, including mention of better business bureau.

Absolutely delicious food! Johnny is the most attentive server and he is absolutely amazing! Wonderful experience; every time I come here, he always makes it pleasant! The ambiance, service and food always make a great night! Thank you Johnny for always taking care of us!

Such good food. Just like Texas de Brazil but 10000000x better. Meat selections from steak duck lamb chicken bacon. There's a pineapple dessert and it's the best pineapple I've ever had. Food is juicy and never dry. Mini buffet has a great selection of foods. Cheese balls are amazing. Everything is cooked to perfection.
We loved our host/ carver Johnny! He took real good care of us and made my mother feel truly special on her birthday. He was amazing!

About a year ago, my fiancée' and I scouted out a few Brazilian steakhouses for our engagement party, and this was the one we decided on. The first time we came here we didn't let anyone know our intentions to get a feel for this place. We were really impressed with the service, the cleanliness of the place and the simple yet classy décor. We just had our engagement party last week and I must say that Rainhas Churrascaria still did not disappoint. I had had a few email conversations with the sales manager Karina regarding our event.  She was always very responsive, answered all of my questions and always encouraged me to contact her for any questions or issues. The day before the event we made arrangements to decorate the Rio Room (Private Room).  On the day of the event...the staff was extremely accommodating and very hospitable. They were very professional and worked with us every step of the way. I couldn't have asked for a better staff to work with in making the event a success. The staff was organized, the food was hot and on time, ready to be served to the guests. All the guests really enjoyed the food,( which is one of the reasons why we chose the place.) Finding a reasonably priced location for an event can be hard. Rainhas made our choice easy. I was truly impressed by the service, and the hospitality of the staff and the Team that worked there. The service was amazing...and they catered to every need we had...including setting up another table for our guests on short notice (we already had 102 guests).  This is a great place to host an event....for a lot of people. They even have Valet Parking.

Melfis is an amazing server who took care of me for my very visit to Rainhas tonight! This all-you-can-eat restaurant has great food, great service, and you will walk out feeling very happy and very full. Highly recommend.

First of all.....I am still daydreaming about the grilled pineapple! Make sure you get it! Now on to the meats....they have so many different cuts of beef, pork & chicken. I absolutely loved the beef wrapped in bacon. All the meat was juicy and delicious. I love their buffet too. The last place I went to only had cold limited selections. Rainhas had a delicious hot food buffet (mashed potatoes, roasted cauliflower, broccoli, Mac & Cheese, Rice & beans...) and salad bar for the best of both worlds. Definitely worth the money and I would come back in a heartbeat.

Fantastic service. The staff was extremely attentive and friendly, especially Johnny. The food was excellent and a server was constantly offering us more food. We didn't stop eating from the moment we walked in! Would highly recommend

I'm giving 5 stars because my boyfriend told me so after going over the events that took place    So the decor is beautiful I had the tables that I requested 35 seats dinner was great too much too much food there is no way after 2 plates you could eat any more the meats came around faster than I could eat and so many different cuts of meats the only meat I thought they could retire was the filet mignon The sodas wasn't refilled enough and they gave only Pepsi or coke but it was very flat  now my issues are we were supposed to get a slice of cake for everyone I had 35 guest and maybe 10 people got desert they said they were coming back with a desert tray the waiter comes back with 5 slices and leaves but I guess they did that because they wanted to recoup their losses because they made a mistake and gave my table a round of sangrias when it was for the other table with the same group of people I appreciate that the manager and the waiter took ownership of the mistake and didn't charge us because when I left the deposit to reserve my tables I specifically stated any alcohol will not be served to my guest But all in all they are organized, and the waiters a++    I will definitely recommend everyone to this restaurant
jhonny is the best his sevice is five stars and the meats are the best and the atmosphere of five stars I recommend them and ask for the section of jhonny the best Churrasqueria...

Two prices, $38~ for meat-included, and $28~ for the non-meat deal. Nothing is specified as what qualifies as "meat", and "non-meat". One of the food servers come to our table, asking us if we wanted corn. One of our "non-meat" people accept the corn,  logically thinking that corn didn't count as meat. Turns out however, that that wasn't the case, and as a result we were forced to pay an extra $10 because apparently corn counts as meat and no one was told. Not only that, but it costs an extra $1.50 per person in order for them to cut a cake for us?! But wait, it gets worse from there. Of course, a buffet is expected to be all-inclusive, but dessert costs extra?! A cut of cake costed an outrageous $8.95. Despite these inappropriate actions, a "gratuity" is mandated at a large 18-20%, considering the extraordinary prices. Absolutely terrible.
Is a great place second time being here for company reasons love the fact that you can get so much food

What a pleasant experience! The ambience of this restaurant is pretty fancy but they don't enforce any dress code. As with most churrascaria, there is a sort of salad buffet but this one also offers hot items such as chicken fingers, onion rings, and French fries (kid-friendly food). They also had roasted chicken and various sides such as rice, steamed veggies and mashed potatoes. In my opinion, most of the sides were pretty bland and lacking in a lot of flavor. But then again, you don't go to Brazilian buffets for the sides! Let's get too the good stuff- the endless meats. There are various servers walking around with char-grilled meats on large skewers. With your place card turned up, they will all come to you and offer you the cut/type of meat they are serving. The meat itself is cooked very well- flavorful with different temps offered. They also have a grilled corn which is absolutely amazing. A lot of people talk about the pineapple which was pleasant but probably not amazing. Servers here are extremely attentive and friendly. If you want a specific item, just ask and they will bring it to you. Definitely A+ service. I also have to emphasize the ambience of this place. There are large windows with water flowing down, reminiscent of waterfalls which goes great with the restaurant name "rainhaus". Already planning my next trip back!

Me and my family have been coming here for a while and we love this place. Tonight was my fathers birthday and our server Johnny was able to take care of us with a smile on his face even though my family can be a little much :) we love the food here the meat and the sides are fresh and cooked to perfection! I would recommend this place for families for sure especially for birthdays and special occasions they really know how to create a great atmosphere! We were very pleased. Thank you Johnny for your great service!

The food was excellent , the buffet /salad bar was just amazing  everything was well prepared and nice ,hot , fresh and endless .The meats were just the bomb well prepared and delicious . The baked pineapple is to die for . And the pineapple desert even better . I couldn't stop eating pineapple.The service was outstanding we were greeted nicely and served fast .our servers were very accommodating and polite .And a big thank you to the guy serving the skewers of meat Johnny he was awesome !Well worth the drive from riverhead .I will be back 1000%You must try it .

I decided to have my husband's bday dinner at Rainhas after the great service we had last year.  So we originally had reserved for 10 people.  I called first thing in the morning at 10am and specifically said so i know it's very last minute but i was wondering if it's possible to up the reservation to 12? The hostess said yes no problem.  When we arrived we told them we had 13 people.  We figured not a biggie if we added an extra chair.  Can you believe they put us on a table for a party of 10????  Then they tried to tell us we made the reservation only for 10. So they had to look at the paper and yes it was changed to 12 people. We told the manager that i had called early that morning and they told us it was okay. They said give them 10mins and they'll move us.  Are you kidding?  We kept checking and they said soon. soon... We were so effin squished. My husband - THE BIRTHDAY BOY didn't even sit inside the table.  He had to hold his plate to eat.  NEVER again will we go to Rainhas.  Apologies don't make things better! Bad management gives bad service!
Great!! All the meats tasted amazing! Ad the dessert! My mouth is getting watery just thinking about it!!

Really delicious and fun Brazilian unlimited bbq spot. My bf and I made the two hour trip from Brooklyn, and it was so worth it! Plenty of great meat options and unlimited options on the buffet of sides to go with the meat and other entrees.

The place overall was clean and the service was on deck!!! I enjoyed everything from the buffet except the Eggplant Parmesan it was very dry. However they have a very nice selection of different dishes. My salad choices were awesome I had the kale salad and a blue cheese salad with bacon that's just mouth bliss. Now let's get down to the meat of this matter !!!!!We had the flank steak, steak sirloin, pork sirloin and the duck, everything was cooked to perfection  and so full of flavor.The pineapple is rotisserie style coated with cinnamon and brown sugar. All I can say is yummmmmmy.
First time at a Brazilian steakhouse and the service was amazing. Johnny took very good care of us and very informative on the types of meats and recommendations

If you like any type of meat - chicken, steak, pork this is the place to be. Endless supply coming right to your table. They give you a card that has "yes, please" and "no, thank you" so they know to come to your table. Johnny was excellent.  Even when we had the card to "no" he would come over if he had something really good. Definitely try the skirt steak, beef tenderloin, and grilled pineapple! Amazing service all around. And if you're lucky you'll see some Brazilian dancers come around =)
Best steakhouse in queens. Amazing service, food & drinks. Huge thanks to Johnny for taking care of us!

This is our first time trying Brazilian BBQ, From the moment we came in the host was very friendly and set up our table right away. Our server Johnny was amazing, impeccable service and extremely polite. All the meat from the grill was juicy and tasty. The salad bar was all filled and neat. Overall it's been a very nice experience.
this is an amazing place to eat and staff is incredible. the food is amazing and johnny especially is a very good waiter. i'm very happy here.
We got the best service from Melfis and Johnny....will definitely come back and recommend....

Food - 7Decor - 8Service - 8Price - $$$ out of $$$$$Parking around the restaurant is hard to come by, just use the free valet. Seating was swift for a party of 4 at 7PM, gets pretty busy past 8PM.Hot and cold buffet is amazing, great selection, fresh and eclectic. On one side you have fries, onion rings and fried plantanos and on the other, eggplant parm, stewed ox tail, shrimp 2 ways and more...Rodizio time, sausage (premio sausage sweet and hot), chicken and filet wrapped with bacon, slow roasted suckling pig (good, but stay away from the chewy skin), top sirloin (had better), roast beef, chicken wings, pineapple (good palette cleanser), BBQ ribs.What Rainhas was missing: Lamb (either chop or shank), skirt steak and weird stuff like chicken liver, hearts, gizzards etc.Beer selection was good, no indicator what's on draft, it's a good idea to ask. Wine selection is great, price is decent, $40 for a $12 retail Malbec. Mexican Coke made with cane sugar... Get one!Bill - Buffet for 4, 1 coke, 5 beers + tip = $240Would repeat? No, this was my second and last time. If your party can eat, then by all means, go for it.Alternative - Rio Grande Churrascaria.
Great food , Great service , went here for my boyfriends birthday and the whole family was happy ! Thank you !

Been here for dinner, but you would never guess Rainha's had a beautiful reception hall easily accessible on the lower level.  Thank you sooooo much for making our special day a success.  Everything from the venue, the food, the drinks were great all thanks to your staff's professionalism and courteous attention.  Everyone had a great time and were impressed with the reception space/private bar.  We can't thank you enough and express our sincere gratitude, you guys rock!
Great food, great service. Always a delight coming here for a fun night out. Johnny, the waiter, is the man!
I've been going here for years. Went again a few weeks ago and the food and service were awesome! Thanks Johnny! Planning on going back tonight!
Excellent restaurant very attentive service always make sure everything is ok with the food and whats on the table no complaints. So far the best service I've had in a long time

This restaurant is pretty good. It's buffet style and they give you this card and on one side it says "Yes,Please" meaning yes come by and bring me some meat and on the other side it says "No, Thank You" meaning I had enough of meats lol. The buffet is really good and they have a lot of choices. For me the buffet part was better than the meats I guess that is because I don't eat pork and they had a lot of pork. And, lastly it only cost $38.00 for buffet and all the meat you can eat..

To my knowledge, this place opened up right around this whole covid craziness happened, and I cannot say this enough:what a WONDERFUL addition to LIC, and I say this with my WHOLE CHEST!!You can taste the authenticity in this food, made with all the steps like a grandma would make it, all without the insanely inflated prices you find in koreatown. They've got everything you crave that's korean: ooey gooey ddukbogi rice cakes, crispy crunchy sweet chicken wings, and heart warming tofu soups and fried rice/noodles. Our soy chicken wings were marvelously crispy without being greasy; they thoughtfully packed it so air could escape from the container without making the chicken soggy en route to your home. i also ordered a beef seafood soup, and it tasted exactly like the tofu soup i love and remember eating growing up; i had not been able to find a place that had that depth of flavor, but i am so thankful i can now purchase this just a few blocks from where i live. they also filled our order to the brim with banchan/appetizer/pickled side dishes and miso soup. Was not expecting to receive this much, but it really rounded out our meal. the kimbaps are great and affordable options to snack on or have a quick lunch as well. we got the shrimp tempura and the bulgogi bc i have no self control. i will thank myself later as i munch on them the rest of the week :)In our 100% accurate order, we even received a chocopie and seaweed with the sweetest handwritten thank you note. It was also prepared quite quickly (within 15 minutes!). When picking up your own food, head around to the side (there will be signs directing you where to go and what doorbell to ring). Right now they're only taking online orders through third party sites (Seamless, Yelp etc), so you can't call in orders from your personal phone. I sincerely, genuinely hope this place makes it through these terrible times and becomes a thriving staple of LIC. I literally just put away the leftovers from this wonderful meal and had to write this review.tl;drYou will not regret supporting this delicious kitchen; I can't wait to keep coming back again and again.

I love Korean food and was so happy to finally find a Korean spot open up in LIC! Lim's appears to have a fairly robust menu with many Korean staples that I look forward to trying. On my first order today, I tried the fried chicken sandwich and tuna kimbap. Both were great! Each item was $8, an awesome value for the quality. The sandwich in particular was great and something I'd definitely order again. Delivery was very quick too with the food still warm.Only downside was I didnt actually order tuna kimbap, but instead bulgogi kimbap. Not going to deduct a star as I'm sure it was an honest mistake and it was still good, but hopefully they get the order right next time.

What a wonderful addition to LIC/Astoria! This was my second time ordering from Lim's Kitchen in a row.The food felt very authentic and fresh. Loved the rice cake and sausage skewer.Delivery was pretty quick and everything was nicely packaged.

This is a new place in our neighborhood. This location used to be Crescent Grill. We actually really wanted to try it but it closed down before we got a chance. SPEED: Not sure if it's because we live minutes away from Lim's but delivery was super fast. 20 min!FOOD: We ordered the japchae, korean sweet and spicy wings; kimchi and pork and vegetable dumplings. The food smelled soo good as soon as we opened the bag. Only thing to note is we wish the dumplings came with a dipping sauce. Overall, everything was delicious! When we feel it's safe to go out to eat again, we would definitely go to Lim's. If not, then we would do take out again. They included a little thank you note with a Choco Pie to stay safe. Nice touch and gesture!

I want to start by saying how fast their response was to my order and even delievered my food to my car!I ordered the spicy pork kimbab and fried chicken combo with the soy garlic sauce. The spicy pork kimbab was really good and I strongly recommend it. About the fried chicken, I enjoyed the scale of each piece. However, I wish there was more soy garlic sauce on the chicken and the sauce had a stronger flavor profile. Over all, it was a great experience ordering from them and I will definitely order from them again! Gotta order my spicy pork kimbab again!

My husband discovered this place near his work and brought home some spicy tuna kimbob and skewer with sausage and ricecake.As a Korean kimbob is quiet tasty and loved the skewers. I love the ricecake (dduk) so much and it was pretty tasty and had interesting sauce. I think this place is pretty authentic and great to satisfy your Korean food needs.

It's great. Especially the chicken wings.I like the kimpab as well and will try other flavor next time. This restaurant is worth trying.I've ordered in this restaurant many times. I love its fried chicken regardless of wings or boneless chicken. It's a great Korean restaurant.

I don't know where to begin... I was surprised how big the portions were and OMG the rice cake with cheese...wow! Picking up the order was confusing because their entrance was hard to find but it's worth it for their food lol

My husband and I ordered so many things here (tuna and bulgogi kimbap, sausage and rice cake on skewer, fried chicken, spicy chicken burger) and every single item was so so so good and authentic. Especially the chicken! It was so fresh and deep-fried perfectly. I'm usually wary of ordering Korean food outside of Flushing, Bayside, Fort Lee, Palisades Park, and KTown in Manhattan -- but this place exceeded my expectations by a mile. I'm so glad that I live within walking distance from this place and will definitely be ordering more! If you live in LIC, give them a call for sure :) you won't be disappointed

Pickup was a little confusing because they have closed down the front entrance for social distancing purposes. You have to go to the side door, which is a steel door with no window which leads down a short stairwell to right where the kitchen is. While pickup was confusing, the tasty food made up for it. All the dishes were very solid, with no duds in this bunch (in order of preference): dukbokki with cheese, soondubu jjigae, fried chicken combo (drums and wings), japchae, bulgogi dupbap and kimbap.The dukbokki with cheese was my favorite. A little sweet, a little spicy, a little tangy; a balance of flavors that makes you to want go back for another bite. The rice cakes were the short, thin, cylinder type and were soft but with a some chew. The mozzarella cheese is extra but so worth it. Also was impressed with the soondubu jjigae. The perfect spice level, full flavored and bodied. Better than some of the soondubu jjigaes I have had at dedicated SDB joints.The fried chicken is also very good. The wings are more crunchy and the larger drumsticks are super moist. I ordered wayyy too much chicken so froze some. Both wings and drumsticks were still good after a brief stint in the oven, the drumsticks were just as moist as days before. The sweet and spicy sauce is gochujang based and was a good alternate to the soy garlic. Japchae was solid, not too salty, plenty of mushrooms but doesn't seem to come with meat unless you add it. The kimbap were well made and fine - my recent visit to Nolbu Sushi my have factored into how I felt about their kimbap since Nolbu was really good. No complaints about the bulgogi dupbap, not too sweet but could use a little more bulgogi and a little less rice. Did feel like this place was a little more pricey than other places but may be forgivable since it is hard to find an all around good Korean joint in the area that can do multiple dishes well.

I order from here quite frequently via seamless and ubereats. As a Korean myself, it's important for me to indulge in Korean food and one that is tasty! I've tried probably all of my limited options here and good food is hard to come by. The best homemade Korean food in the area. Highly recommend! Really a jewel that I have found this amazing place.The restaurant staff is always quick, friendly, & do a excellent job!! They always throw in extra side dishes and are quicker than the ETA. LOVE! Thank you for being so top tier!!

Ordered takeout after discovering it on a food app during a craving for Korean food, to find it just recently opened in the area during these unfortunate times. Not only is this the first Korean restaurant I'm aware of in the LIC Court  Square/Hunter's Point area, but it's actually, truly legitimate Korean! With no exaggeration, I can say it belongs with the best you can find in Ktown. I ordered the fried chicken, rice cakes (+ cheese, which is a trend now), japchae, and seafood pancake. Admittedly, my expectations weren't that high, but the food was top-notch. In addition, they threw in some covid freebies with our delivery and a little handwritten thank you note, which is strangely heartwarming.  100% recommend this new haunt in the neighborhood.

My wife wanted a quick snack and selected this place based on its stellar ratings on here. We got one spicy pork kimbap - then had a hell if a time finding the place! Although it's technically on Crescent, the entrance (at least for now due to Covid???) is around the corner. Talk about under the radar! Buzz the buzzer and you will descend into a bunker like industrial kitchen. The staff was very friendly and accommodating, the food was beautiful AND incredibly delicious - by far the best kimbap we have had. Plus they included a cute note and free moon pie! We are very much looking forward to a return trip to sample a wider variety of items. Well worth the trip!

Such a neatly prepared food lol I'm a big fan of Bibimbap and I was disappointed at one near me. I tried yours for the first time today. It tasted so fresh and  great . Also my son loved your fried chicken sandwich. Definitely see YOU soon

I ordered from them today and just had to write a review. I live in manhattan so the prices of Lim's kitchen's korean food are so much more affordable than Ktown.  The food was amazing and the delivery was fast! I got the fried chicken (spicy 2 and soy garlic). Both of which were fantastic. Also got the ddeokbukgi and kimbap. I think all of their prices are very reasonable and the quality of the food is very high. Would recommend going/ordering from here for delicious, reasonably priced Korean food.
My go-to Kimbap place in Long Island City. There is a decent kimbap selection in their menu! My fav one is the bulgogi!Also love their army stew!

So good! My husband and I found our new go to Korean place. Living in Astoria, we tried the few Korean options but still missing good traditional cuisine. Thanks to a Grubhub search during coronavirus, this LIC gem came up and so glad we tried it. Kimchi Jigae was spicy and fatty, kimchi bokeumbap was tasty and comforting (could have been a little spicier for our taste), tuna kimbap was fresh with sweet takuan. Chicken wings were a little disappointing considering that's where the bulk of the great reviews concentrated on. We ordered 10 wings but came as a combo, no big deal so my husband can try it but the drumsticks had a bit too much fried breading and not enough soy garlic sauce. Not a deal breaker, just didn't expect it. But the best part, they taped a thank you note on a free soda can with Happy Easter. So kind! Will be ordering again and excited to tell my Umma about it!**UPDATE** 1 week laterOrdered here again and so thrilled this place exists. I could order the kimchi jigae everyday and my husband ordered the budaejigae this time and loved it. The ramen was packaged separately so it wouldn't get too soft in transit. Food was piping hot when it arrived. There was even some banchan included. The person delivering was so kind and thankful we ordered from them. And they left another note on a free soda and I burst out in tears. If you want comforting delicious korean food with kind owners, please order from here.
Amazing food .. love it..  Delivery is super fast as well .. love love their kimbap.. i have ordered more than 5 times in this past month..

The kimbaps were big and full of flavor, so tasty! Perfect for a picnic snack outside. Tried the spicy tuna (my favorite), donkatsu, and spicy pork belly. The fried breading on the donkatsu one was still crispy, which was a pleasant surprise. And delivery was so fast! Highly highly recommend :) oh and the chocopie was a super cute touch!
Got the shrimp tempura kimbap and the  bulgogi over rice. Food was DELICIOUS!! even got a personalized thank you note! Highly recommend!

We usually do not leave reviews, but this was well deserved. I just had their fried chicken and kimbap and it was amazing - very authentic, fresh, and proper cooked. Probably some of the best Korean food found in Queens / LIC.

Got delivery twice and both times the food was great. The chicken sandwich and wings were crispy and juicy, and the spicy rice cake was very good.Each time the service was good too. Food came quickly and they also added a free mini choco cake as a thank you. Definitely will be ordering here many times

Our new go-to spot for Korean food! They have consistently delivered the food on time or EARLY (like 15 minutes early sometimes) and the food is piping hot! Not to mention the food is good!Keep up the excellent work - and we will continue to order!

I hardly write reviews but I HAD TO for Lim's kitchen!!! First- the man who delivered my food was so incredibly lovely. He thanked me for ordering and gave me the warmest smile and even bowed to me (Korean custom). This made me even more excited to eat!! The food was AMAZING!! I got rice cakes and bulgogi over rice and it's the best Korean food I've ever had! So flavorful and the perfect balance of spices. It arrived neatly packed and warm and just SO DELICIOUS!!!! Order from Lim's!!!!!!

Ordered delivery tonight. Super, super fast delivery. Like! Amazing. Food just as ordered. Delicious. And you can order some booze to compliment the meal too ;)The woman who delivered the food was so kind. Will order again, 100%.

Staying in LIC for work, and ordered food for delivery. The app said 40-50 minutes for delivery time when I ordered. They delivered my order within 20 minutes, and included a cup of miso soup and a choco pie for free (with a handwritten note wishing me a great day, and asking for feedback on how they can improve). The food was good, and I'll be ordering here every time I visit the area.

I discovered this restaurant a few weeks ago and have since been ordering from here non-stop. The food is delicious and authentic, and very reasonably priced for the quality and quantity. Delivery has also been super quick, the food comes hot and fresh, and the owners often include sweet notes about staying safe, along with free snacks (chocopie!) I'd especially recommend all of the kimbabs. Such a gem, very strongly recommend!

We were craving for some Korean food and there they are! The delivery came in fast and they left a sweet note (handwritten :) ). The food tasted amazing. Love everything we've ordered so far: the soy garlic wings, seafood pancake, spicy rice cake and the kimchi stew (the army stew from our last order also tasted good but was a bit too spicy for us..). I am pretty sure we will order again soon.
Excellent customer service. I got the tuna kimbap for pickup and the portion sizes were well worth the price. The lady who gave me my food was super nice too.
Great Korean food!! We just ordered the bulgogi over rice and the spicy chicken sandwich! Both very good! They even put a mask with a HAND WRITTEN note saying thank you for ordering from them!!
I love how they showed gratitude for me placing my order with them. Delivery was super fast and the food was delicious. You can tell Lim's Kitchen aims to please their customers. 5 stars!!!

I've been itching for Korean food, and was able to find Lim's Kitchen near me. Ordered a kimchi fried rice for lunch takeout. They prepared my meal within 10 minutes, and I met up a person on the staff outside the restaurant to pick up my food.The kimchi fried rice was tasty, not extremely spicy like some other restaurants would make it! On top of the good food, I had a couple of small dishes and a soda added in free of charge, although I'm unsure whether that was because of the situation or because they were just that generous! Either way, it was a great experience, and I would encourage all to support this business during this time!
Great food, just find out this korean restaurant in our neighborhood! Very authentic, best spicy chicken burger we had in NYC
